message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with a price of $1,000,000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but that price is a little high for me. Would you consider $850,000?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping to get closer to the value it holds for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $950,000.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $900,000?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I was thinking that $900,000 is still a bit low considering the value the product holds for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll counteroffer at $925,000.
Alice, this is getting close to what I can do.  I'm willing to offer $910,000 to close this out today.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. However, I think we can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you at $920,000, which is just $10,000 above your last offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $915,000 is my final offer.  If you can't accept that, I'll have to go with John.

I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I'll counteroffer at $918,000, which is just $3,000 above your last offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider selling to John.
